Art. 4.251. 
Signing of the agreement 
The agreement may not be signed before one month has elapsed from the date of the meeting referred to in Article 4.250. 
Each of the parties may request the intervention of another notary who will assist them when the deed is received.
Parties to the agreement who are of full age and capable may be represented by a proxy holding a special authenticated power of attorney. This power of attorney may only be granted after the period referred to in paragraph 1 has elapsed.
The date on which the draft agreement was sent and the date on which the meeting referred to in article 4.250 was held are mentioned in the agreement.
The period referred to in the first paragraph and that referred to in Article 4.250, ¤ 3 may not be waived, even with the agreement of the parties.
